"A.P.238/4/9/ 11:30": "Hehe, very good. You've been getting better and better at fighting, you know?"
"Some of your moves are so sharp that it gives Lisa chills. You've made so much progress."
"Lisa doesn't have faulty eyes. She might have other parts that are faulty, but Lisa takes pride in her eyes."
"Lisa gets a very special feeling from you. It actually kind of scares Lisa."
"You can become way, waaay stronger. That's for sure. Lisa's eyes are never wrong."
"So get way, waaay stronger so you can kill more and more and more and more bad guys with Lisa, okay?"
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Huey, Huey! I want to take part too! Let me join in!"
"You're part of the staff... Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"...Right now, the pair in the lead is the Ranger Lisa and <%me>!"
"Oh, I feel like I've heard that name before..."

"...I mean, isn't this score a bit too high? But if they're that strong,
that's OK!"
"Next, the pair of the Force Marlu and the Hunter Ohza!"
"But it seems like the rumored Information Sisters are also working hard!"
"Who?"
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"Hey, Huey. Aren't you just reading from your notes? How's that fun?"
"The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"Look, Claris Claes. I know that acting like an adult can be difficult. But sometimes we need to follow the script."
"For now, let's read up about the participants."
"Oh dear, what's this? Maybe we went a little overboard for only the first half?"
"Doesn't really matter, though. Lisa's going even harder in the second half."
